DataElement.preferredName: Bitewing Radiograph Diagnostic Imaging Assessment Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of the evaluation of the radiographic film that is positioned in the mouth by biting on a central tab or positioning wing for diagnosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the evaluation of the radiographic film that is positioned in the mouth by biting on a central tab or positioning wing for diagnosis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition:
A radiographic film that is positioned in the mouth by biting on a central tab or positioning wing.
Coronal images of the maxillary and mandibular teeth are recorded.:Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: A radiographic film that is positioned in the mouth by biting on a central tab or positioning wing.  Coronal images of the maxillary and mandibular teeth are recorded.
Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
